about_the_game:
West Hunt Exclusive Pack 1

Mix it up a bit in the Wild West with some fun skins and personalizations from our first DLC, the Exclusive Pack 1! Featuring 4 Sheriff skins, a handsome Doberman, a feisty winning Emote, and a very threatening Title!

All items in the pack are cosmetic only and do not change gameplay mechanics or provide any gameplay advantages.

Sheriff Skin: Zombie - 2 variations, Male and Female
Strike fear into the Outlaw as you stalk through town as the living dead! Show your dedication as even the afterlife cannot stop an officer from patrolling the streets for any mischief and mayhem!

Sheriff Skin: Santa
Old St. Nick keeps a watchful eye on the naughty and nice all year round, and this time he’s looking to take some action against the naughty. You better watch out, cause Santa Clause is coming to town!

Sheriff Skin: Hamadi
With a slick mustache and smooth cigar, look imposing and effortlessly chill at the same time as you stroll around. It’s your town, and finding a few Outlaws is just another easy job done for you.

Pet: Doberman
A fearless and proud breed, the Doberman is the perfect companion for a Sheriff! Outlaw would have to think twice when crossing paths with the muscular and powerful Doberman!

Winning Emote: Fighting Stance
Get ready to catch these hands! It’s time for a good old fashion throwdown! You’re not afraid to get down and get scrappy! Show ‘em you mean business with the Fighting Stance emote!

Title: Black Hand
Always up to no good? Let ‘em know with the “Black Hand” title. Any Sheriff that sees the title Black Hand will know it’s going to be a little trickier to deal with you… if they even can at all!

name: West Hunt- Exclusive Pack1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-10
  • Processor: Intel i3-5005U -AMD 3015Ce
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: West Hunt: Exclusive Pack 1 : Mix it up a bit in the Wild West with some fun skins and personalizations from our first DLC, the Exclusive Pack 1! Featuring 4 Sheriff skins, a handsome Doberman, a feisty winning Emote, and a very threatening Title!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
